## scrollend-polyfill package

Polyfills `scrollend` event for [PolyfilledTarget](./scrollend-polyfill.polyfilledtarget.md)<!-- -->.

## Remarks

Scroll is considered ended when touch events are not active ( user released touch ) and `scroll` event was not fired within [SCROLL\_DEBOUNCE\_INTERVAL](./scrollend-polyfill.scroll_debounce_interval.md) since last invocation. Does nothing when used in `node` environment.

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [SCROLL\_DEBOUNCE\_INTERVAL](./scrollend-polyfill.scroll_debounce_interval.md) | debounce interval in milliseconds for attached <code>scroll</code> event. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [PolyfilledTarget](./scrollend-polyfill.polyfilledtarget.md) | Targets to monkey-patch <code>addEventListener</code> / <code>removeEventListener</code>. |
